assert-server-service.description: To run this tutorial enable 'Sample configuration' in GATT Server configuration. Service validation

sleep.description: This sample will show how to automate sending every second a notification from the Android device.
Make sure the connected device enabled CCCD for 0000aaa1-0000-1000-8000-aabbccddeeff characteristic.
Now sleep some time, so the notification is sent every second.
To run the macro in a loop check the ⇄ option above, and run macro with ▶ button.
